flawed_nl_solution:
The burritos have 10*120=<<10*120=1200>>1200 calories
That means he gets 1200/6=<<1200/6=200>>200 calories per dollar
The burgers get 5*400=<<5*400=20000>>20000 calories
So he gets 20000/8=<<20000/8=2500>>2500 calories per dollar
So he gets 2500-200=<<2500-200=2300>>2300 more calories per dollar from the burgers
#### 2300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 20000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
